messages.subject: HEM Jan-Feb 2002
messages.msgSnippet: I just received another great issue of Home Education Magazine.  I wanted to point out Helen Hegener s Publisher s Note article on page 6 to this list. It
messages.messageBody:
I just received another great issue of Home Education Magazine. I wanted to
point out Helen Hegener's "Publisher's Note" article on page 6 to this list.
It touched my heart and spoke to the point we've recently discussed about TV
and ambition and life goals, etc., though it didn't mention any of those
things specifically. :-) I also especially liked the article "Confessions
of an Unsuccessful Homeschooler" on page 39 as I think it addresses the
fears of many homeschoolers--particularly new-ish unschoolers. And that's
where I stopped yesterday...will be reading the rest of the issue this
afternoon w/ tea. Great stuff as usual from Home Education Magazine.
Thanks Helen and Mark and all the contributing writers!

Leslie Moyer / Oklahoma


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
